pages.title: LTraveler — Quiet spot with some useful IDENA scripts
pages.description:
IDENA Runner - Quick start
      Idena Blockchain Fast Sync: The highroad to IDENA mining ⚒️ success
pages.content:
All scripts has been written as a creative process of understanding how the IDENA infrstracture works and all of them are used in the working projects of my shared and personal nodes. If you are donwloading the stable version of any of my scripts there is a pretty high chance to get convenient tool that could save your time in your own IDENA deployment.

🔭 The projects that I am currently working on


  Idena Runner — Bash Script implementation of the idena-go node application.
  Idena Blockchain Bootstrap — Idena Blockchain daily snapshot implementation for fast synch.


🔞 Some thoughts that didn’t pass Medium censorship


  Hive Blog — PornHub + IDENA: train your mind and watch porn in Premium mode
  Tealfeed — PornHub + IDENA Blockchain: train your mind and watch porn in Premium mode


▶️ YouTube Channel


   Crypto Ratel — Proof-of-Personhood as a predicate for a fair democracy


📫 Contacts and Thankfulness


  💬 Telegram: https://t.me/ltrvlr
  IDNA Cold 👛: 0xf041640788910fc89a211cd5bcbf518f4f14d831
  🖥️ Personalized Shared Node Server: https://t.me/ltrvlr

pages.title: My Active Projects
pages.description: The list of my projects I am currently working on.  Most of them are related to the IDENA Human-centric Blockchain. The purpose of those scripts and services to help you to make your entry into IDENA Network as easy as it can be without loosing safety concern. Sit back, relax the rest of the job the script will do it for you.

documents.title: Idena Blockchain Snapshot - Fast Sync of your IDENA Node
documents.description: IDENA blockchain snapshot (updated daily) for fast synchronization of the Idena network node (idena-go).
documents.content: The snapshot will help you to sync your Idena Node in a matter of minutes.

documents.title: IDENA Runner —  Quick start script of idena-go client configuration with possibility to run your shared node
documents.description: Bash Script implementation of the Idena network node installation wizard with the possibility to install multiple idena-go instances (1 user — 1 instance)
